full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BLA MA DAM PA'I ZHAL SHES ZIN BRIS NYAMS LEN DBANG MDZOD CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @036B (CES BLA MA DAM PA'I ZHAL SHES ZIN BRIS NYAMS LEN DBANG MDZAD CES BYA BA 'DI NI, RJE GRUB PA'I DBANG PHYUG KLONG RDOL BLA MA RIN PO CHE NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG DPAL BZANG PO DANG, ,KHYAB BDAG DANG PO'I SANGS RGYAS, ^ RGYAL SRAS BSKAL BZANG THUB BSTAN 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS DANG, KHYAD PAR BKA' DRIN MTSUNGS MED THUB DBANG RDO RJE 'CHANG DNGOS KHRI CHEN CHOS KYI RGYAL PO, ^ BLO BZANG YE SHES BSTAN PA RAB RGYAS DPAL BZANG PO SOGS YONGS 'DZIN DU MA'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOS REG CING, LAM RIM BLO SBYONG GI ZAB CHOS DU MA THOB PA'I DRIN LAS, BOD BU MI'I KHYUR CHUD PA'I SKAL BZANG THOB PA'I BTZUN GZUGS BLO BZANG BSTAN SPEL ZHES BYA BAS RANG GI BRJED THOR BRIS PA'O, ,) @037A *, ,AOm SVA STI, ,YUN RING DRIN GYIS BSKYANG PA'I MA RGAN 'GRO, ,'KHOR BA SRIN MO'I GLING DU TSUD PA DAG, ,SGROL BA'I DED DPON SNGON BYON MKHAS GRUB RNAMS, ,BYANG CHUB BAR DU 'BRAL MED GTZUG TU BSTEN, , BSHES LA GUS SHING GZUR GNAS BLO LDAN DAG ,RNAM GROL THAR PA'I GLING DU BSGROD PA LA, ,NYE BAR MKHO BA PHA ME'I KHYAD NOR GYIS, ,YONGS BKANG ZIN BRIS LEGS BSHAD BANG MDZOD 'DI, ,MANG THOS NYAMS LEN MCHOG LA GZHOL BA YI, ,DPYOD LDAN GU SHRI 'JAM DBYANGS NOR BU YIS, ,CHOS SBYIN SPEL SLAD MTHUN RKYEN LEGS SBYAR TE, ,MI ZAD PAR DU BSKRUN PA'I DGE TSOGS MTHUS, ,RGYAL BSTAN SPYI DANG YANG SNYING TZONG KHA PA'I, ,DRI MED RING LUGS DAR ZHING RGYAS PA DANG, DE 'DZIN ZHABS BRTAN DGE 'DUN SDE TSOGS RGYAS, ,'JIG RTEN KHAMS SU BDE SKYID 'PHEL GYUR CIG ,KHYAD PAR RGYU SBYOR PHA MA LTOS BCAS KUN, ,GNAS SKABS NYER 'TSE'I RIGS ZHI TSE BSOD RGYAS, ,MTHAR THUG SKU BZHI'I GO 'PHANG MNGON GYUR NAS, ,MA RNAMS SGROL BA'I DED DPON MCHOG GYUR CIG ,CES RIGS BRGYA'I KHYAB BDAG KHRI CHEN RDO RJE 'CHANG DANG, ,GRUB DBANG KLONG RDOL SOGS KYI ZHAL SHES MAN NGAG ZIN BRIS SU BTAB PA 'DI NYID RANG GZHAN KUN LA PHAN CHE BAR MTHONG NAS PAR DU BSGRUBS TSE PAR BYANG SMON TSIG TU, ,^BTZUN GZUGS CHO SHES SPRUL MING PAS SBYAR BA'O, ,BKRA SHIS 'BAR GYUR CIG ,)
